name: FreightMas Sales Invoice
FreightMas Quotation
FreightMas TBSI

html:
{%- set no_default_print_heading = 1 -%} {%- from "templates/print_formats/standard_macros.html" import add_header -%}
Quotation Cost Sheet
Quotation No.: {{ doc.name }} Date: {{ frappe.utils.formatdate(doc.transaction_date, "dd-MMM-yy") }}
Customer: {{ doc.customer_name }} Job Type: {{ doc.job_type or "-" }}
Job Description: {{ doc.job_description or "-" }}
Cost & Revenue Summary
Expected Revenue {{ frappe.utils.fmt_money(doc.est_revenue or 0, currency=doc.currency, format="#,##0.00") }}
Expected Cost {{ frappe.utils.fmt_money(doc.est_cost or 0, currency=doc.currency, format="#,##0.00") }}
Expected Profit (Margin) {{ frappe.utils.fmt_money(doc.est_profit or ((doc.est_revenue or 0) - (doc.est_cost or 0)), currency=doc.currency, format="#,##0.00") }}
Margin % {% if doc.est_revenue %} {{ (((doc.est_profit or ((doc.est_revenue or 0) - (doc.est_cost or 0))) / (doc.est_revenue or 1)) * 100) | round(2) }}% {% else %} 0% {% endif %}
Item Breakdown
{% for item in doc.items %} {% endfor %}
Description Supplier Revenue Cost Margin
{{ item.item_name }} {{ item.supplier or "-" }} {{ frappe.utils.fmt_money(item.amount or 0, currency=doc.currency, format="#,##0.00") }} {{ frappe.utils.fmt_money(item.cost_amount or 0, currency=doc.currency, format="#,##0.00") }} {{ frappe.utils.fmt_money((item.amount or 0) - (item.cost_amount or 0), currency=doc.currency, format="#,##0.00") }}
Total {{ frappe.utils.fmt_money(doc.items | sum(attribute='amount'), currency=doc.currency, format="#,##0.00") }} {{ frappe.utils.fmt_money(doc.items | sum(attribute='cost_amount'), currency=doc.currency, format="#,##0.00") }} {{ frappe.utils.fmt_money((doc.items | sum(attribute='amount')) - (doc.items | sum(attribute='cost_amount')), currency=doc.currency, format="#,##0.00") }}
For internal use only. Not for customer distribution.
name: Quotation Cost Sheet

html:
{%- set no_default_print_heading = 1 -%} {% set cost_data = frappe.call('freightmas.utils.fwjb_cost_sheet_calc.get_charge_details_for_cost_sheet', job_name=doc.name) or {} %} {% set party_data = frappe.call('freightmas.utils.fwjb_cost_sheet_calc.get_party_details_for_cost_sheet', job_name=doc.name) or {} %} {% set totals = frappe.call('freightmas.utils.fwjb_cost_sheet_calc.get_job_totals_summary', job_name=doc.name) or {} %}
{{ doc.company or "FreightMas" }} - Forwarding Job Cost Sheet
Job No:{{ doc.name }}Date:{{ doc.date_created }}
Customer:{{ doc.customer }}Mode:{{ (doc.shipment_mode or "Sea") ~ " " ~ (doc.direction or "Import") }}
Customer Ref:{{ doc.customer_reference or "—" }}Status:{{ doc.status or "Draft" }}
Costing Summary: Quoted vs Working vs Invoiced
METRICQUOTEDWORKINGVAR (W-Q)INVOICEDVAR (I-Q)
Revenue{{ "{:,.0f}".format(doc.total_quoted_revenue or 0) }}{{ "{:,.0f}".format(doc.total_working_revenue or 0) }}{{ "{:,.0f}".format((doc.total_working_revenue or 0) - (doc.total_quoted_revenue or 0)) }}{{ "{:,.0f}".format(totals.invoiced_revenue or 0) }}{{ "{:,.0f}".format((totals.invoiced_revenue or 0) - (doc.total_quoted_revenue or 0)) }}
Cost{{ "{:,.0f}".format(doc.total_quoted_cost or 0) }}{{ "{:,.0f}".format(doc.total_working_cost or 0) }}{{ "{:,.0f}".format((doc.total_working_cost or 0) - (doc.total_quoted_cost or 0)) }}{{ "{:,.0f}".format(totals.invoiced_cost or 0) }}{{ "{:,.0f}".format((totals.invoiced_cost or 0) - (doc.total_quoted_cost or 0)) }}
Margin{{ "{:,.0f}".format((doc.total_quoted_revenue or 0) - (doc.total_quoted_cost or 0)) }}{{ "{:,.0f}".format((doc.total_working_revenue or 0) - (doc.total_working_cost or 0)) }}{{ "{:,.0f}".format(((doc.total_working_revenue or 0) - (doc.total_working_cost or 0)) - ((doc.total_quoted_revenue or 0) - (doc.total_quoted_cost or 0))) }}{{ "{:,.0f}".format((totals.invoiced_revenue or 0) - (totals.invoiced_cost or 0)) }}{{ "{:,.0f}".format(((totals.invoiced_revenue or 0) - (totals.invoiced_cost or 0)) - ((doc.total_quoted_revenue or 0) - (doc.total_quoted_cost or 0))) }}
Margin %{{ "%.1f"|format(totals.quoted_margin_percent or 0) }}%{{ "%.1f"|format(totals.working_margin_percent or 0) }}%—{{ "%.1f"|format(totals.invoiced_margin_percent or 0) }}%—
Charge Breakdown: Quoted vs Working
{% for charge in cost_data.charges or [] %}{% endfor %}
CHARGEQUOTED REVWORKING REVVARIANCEQUOTED COSTWORKING COSTVARIANCE
{{ charge.charge }}{{ "{:,.0f}".format(charge.quoted_revenue or 0) }}{{ "{:,.0f}".format(charge.working_revenue or 0) }}{{ "{:,.0f}".format((charge.working_revenue or 0) - (charge.quoted_revenue or 0)) }}{{ "{:,.0f}".format(charge.quoted_cost or 0) }}{{ "{:,.0f}".format(charge.working_cost or 0) }}{{ "{:,.0f}".format((charge.working_cost or 0) - (charge.quoted_cost or 0)) }}
TOTAL{{ "{:,.0f}".format(cost_data.totals.quoted_revenue or 0) }}{{ "{:,.0f}".format(cost_data.totals.working_revenue or 0) }}{{ "{:,.0f}".format((cost_data.totals.working_revenue or 0) - (cost_data.totals.quoted_revenue or 0)) }}{{ "{:,.0f}".format(cost_data.totals.quoted_cost or 0) }}{{ "{:,.0f}".format(cost_data.totals.working_cost or 0) }}{{ "{:,.0f}".format((cost_data.totals.working_cost or 0) - (cost_data.totals.quoted_cost or 0)) }}
Charge Breakdown: Quoted vs Invoiced (Variance Analysis)
{% for charge in cost_data.charges or [] %}{% endfor %}
CHARGEQUOTED REVINVOICED REVVARIANCEQUOTED COSTINVOICED COSTVARIANCE
{{ charge.charge }}{{ "{:,.0f}".format(charge.quoted_revenue or 0) }}{{ "{:,.0f}".format(charge.invoiced_revenue or 0) }}{{ "{:,.0f}".format((charge.invoiced_revenue or 0) - (charge.quoted_revenue or 0)) }}{{ "{:,.0f}".format(charge.quoted_cost or 0) }}{{ "{:,.0f}".format(charge.invoiced_cost or 0) }}{{ "{:,.0f}".format((charge.invoiced_cost or 0) - (charge.quoted_cost or 0)) }}
TOTAL{{ "{:,.0f}".format(cost_data.totals.quoted_revenue or 0) }}{{ "{:,.0f}".format(cost_data.totals.invoiced_revenue or 0) }}{{ "{:,.0f}".format((cost_data.totals.invoiced_revenue or 0) - (cost_data.totals.quoted_revenue or 0)) }}{{ "{:,.0f}".format(cost_data.totals.quoted_cost or 0) }}{{ "{:,.0f}".format(cost_data.totals.invoiced_cost or 0) }}{{ "{:,.0f}".format((cost_data.totals.invoiced_cost or 0) - (cost_data.totals.quoted_cost or 0)) }}
Party Breakdown: Customers
{% for party in party_data.customers or [] %}{% endfor %}
CUSTOMERQUOTED REVWORKING REVVAR (W-Q)INVOICED REVVAR (I-Q)
{{ party.party }}{{ "{:,.0f}".format(party.quoted_revenue or 0) }}{{ "{:,.0f}".format(party.working_revenue or 0) }}{{ "{:,.0f}".format((party.working_revenue or 0) - (party.quoted_revenue or 0)) }}{{ "{:,.0f}".format(party.invoiced_revenue or 0) }}{{ "{:,.0f}".format((party.invoiced_revenue or 0) - (party.quoted_revenue or 0)) }}
TOTAL CUSTOMERS{{ "{:,.0f}".format(party_data.totals.quoted_revenue or 0) }}{{ "{:,.0f}".format(party_data.totals.working_revenue or 0) }}{{ "{:,.0f}".format((party_data.totals.working_revenue or 0) - (party_data.totals.quoted_revenue or 0)) }}{{ "{:,.0f}".format(party_data.totals.invoiced_revenue or 0) }}{{ "{:,.0f}".format((party_data.totals.invoiced_revenue or 0) - (party_data.totals.quoted_revenue or 0)) }}
Party Breakdown: Suppliers
{% for party in party_data.suppliers or [] %}{% endfor %}
SUPPLIERQUOTED COSTWORKING COSTVAR (W-Q)INVOICED COSTVAR (I-Q)
{{ party.party }}{{ "{:,.0f}".format(party.quoted_cost or 0) }}{{ "{:,.0f}".format(party.working_cost or 0) }}{{ "{:,.0f}".format((party.working_cost or 0) - (party.quoted_cost or 0)) }}{{ "{:,.0f}".format(party.invoiced_cost or 0) }}{{ "{:,.0f}".format((party.invoiced_cost or 0) - (party.quoted_cost or 0)) }}
TOTAL SUPPLIERS{{ "{:,.0f}".format(party_data.totals.quoted_cost or 0) }}{{ "{:,.0f}".format(party_data.totals.working_cost or 0) }}{{ "{:,.0f}".format((party_data.totals.working_cost or 0) - (party_data.totals.quoted_cost or 0)) }}{{ "{:,.0f}".format(party_data.totals.invoiced_cost or 0) }}{{ "{:,.0f}".format((party_data.totals.invoiced_cost or 0) - (party_data.totals.quoted_cost or 0)) }}

Generated on {{ doc.date_created }} | {{ doc.currency or "USD" }} | FreightMas
name: Forwarding Job Cost Sheet

html:
{%- set no_default_print_heading = 1 -%}
Road Freight Job Cost Sheet
Job No.: {{ doc.name }} Date: {{ frappe.utils.formatdate(doc.date_created, "dd-MMM-yy") }}
Customer: {{ doc.customer }} Mode: {{ (doc.shipment_type or "-") ~ " " ~ (doc.direction or "") }}
Cost & Revenue Summary
Total Estimated Revenue {{ frappe.utils.fmt_money(doc.total_estimated_revenue or 0, currency=doc.currency, format="#,##0.00") }}
Total Estimated Cost {{ frappe.utils.fmt_money(doc.total_estimated_cost or 0, currency=doc.currency, format="#,##0.00") }}
Total Estimated Profit {{ frappe.utils.fmt_money(doc.total_estimated_profit or ((doc.total_estimated_revenue or 0) - (doc.total_estimated_cost or 0)), currency=doc.currency, format="#,##0.00") }}
Margin % {% if doc.total_estimated_revenue %} {{ (((doc.total_estimated_profit or ((doc.total_estimated_revenue or 0) - (doc.total_estimated_cost or 0))) / (doc.total_estimated_revenue or 1)) * 100) | round(2) }}% {% else %} 0% {% endif %}
Charge Breakdown
{% for row in doc.road_freight_charges %} {% endfor %}
Charge Supplier Revenue Cost Margin
{{ row.charge }} {{ row.supplier or "-" }} {{ frappe.utils.fmt_money(row.revenue_amount or 0, currency=doc.currency, format="#,##0.00") }} {{ frappe.utils.fmt_money(row.cost_amount or 0, currency=doc.currency, format="#,##0.00") }} {{ frappe.utils.fmt_money((row.revenue_amount or 0) - (row.cost_amount or 0), currency=doc.currency, format="#,##0.00") }}
Total {{ frappe.utils.fmt_money(doc.road_freight_charges | sum(attribute='revenue_amount'), currency=doc.currency, format="#,##0.00") }} {{ frappe.utils.fmt_money(doc.road_freight_charges | sum(attribute='cost_amount'), currency=doc.currency, format="#,##0.00") }} {{ frappe.utils.fmt_money((doc.road_freight_charges | sum(attribute='revenue_amount')) - (doc.road_freight_charges | sum(attribute='cost_amount')), currency=doc.currency, format="#,##0.00") }}
For internal use only. Not for customer distribution.
name: Road Freight Job Cost Sheet

html:

Margin % {% if doc.total_estimated_revenue %} {{ (((doc.total_estimated_profit or ((doc.total_estimated_revenue or 0) - (doc.total_estimated_cost or 0))) / (doc.total_estimated_revenue or 1)) * 100) | round(2) }}% {% else %} 0% {% endif %}
